C

canMove(int) - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.Drone
Assuming that the drone is neither started outside the confinement area, nor inside a No-Fly-Zone, the drone is able to move to a point at the appropriate distance if and only if none of the borders of any of these polygons are crossed.
canMoveTowardsGoal() - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.Drone
This method determines whether the the drone can take a step towards its current destination without leaving the confinement area or entering any no-fly-zone.

completeTour() - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.MainDrone
This acts as the "main method" of this class.
computeDistance(Point, Point) - Static method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.geometry.EuclideanUtils
Computes the Euclidean distance between 2 points in the 2D-plane.
computeDistanceMatrix(List<Point>) - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.map.TourPlanner
An instance of the Travelling Salesman Problem can be identified by its distance matrix.
computeNextPosTowardsGoal() - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.ShadowDrone
This helper method is a shortcut that computes the next position of our drone if it was to fly straight towards its destination.
computeOrientation(Point, Point, Point) - Static method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.geometry.EuclideanUtils
Given three points A, B and C, this method determines the orientation of the triangle through the points A,B and C (in this order).
computeRoundedAngleOfLineToGoal() - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.Drone
This helper method constructs a line from the drone's position to its destination, computes its angle and rounds the result to give the "legal" angle that the drone can use that comes closest to the real direction.
computeTierForReading(double) - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.application.OutputGenerator
This helper method computes the "pollution tier" of a given air quality measurement.
confinementArea - Static variable in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.application.App
 
coordinates - Variable in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.webserver.JsonWhat3WordsStub
 
costOfAvoidingObstacle(TwoDimensionalMapObject, double, boolean) - Method in class uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.drone.ShadowDrone
Given an obstacle, the max. distance to its destination that our drone has to reach, as well as the way around the obstacle which this shadow drone should attempt, this method computes a way of dodging / rotating around the obstacle in the given direction.
